product_name: Marmot Norhiem Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Cozy and stylish, the women's heathered Marmot Norhiem Fleece Jacket delivers warmth, comfort and compliments when you're in the backcountry or simply crossing the street. Substantial sweater-knit fleece with brushed interior wicks moisture, holds in warmth and dries quickly. Soft, stretch binding trims the low-profile, shaped hood; collar zips up around face and hood for good protection. Windflap tucked behind the front zipper knocks down chilly drafts. Stretch binding trim at hem, cuffs and hand pockets. Marmot Norhiem Fleece Jacket for women has open hand pockets for warmth. Closeout.
short_description: Cozy and stylish, the women's heathered Marmot Norhiem Fleece Jacket delivers warmth, comfort and compliments when you're in the backcountry or simply crossing the street.
